example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 句))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 常)) (VP (VP (SB 被) (VP (VV 用) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-2)))) (VP (MSP 来) (VP (VV 描述) (NP-OBJ (NN 女人))))))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 知名)) (NP (NN 谚语))) (PU ，) (VP (PP-TMP (P 在) (LCP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 进入) (NP-OBJ (QP (OD 二十一)) (NP (NN 世纪))))) (LC 後))) (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (LB 被) (CP-OBJ (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 男性)) (VP (PP-MNR (P 以) (NP (ADJP (JJ 实际)) (NP (NN 行动)))) (VP (VV 改写) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)))))))))
